Eric Annan, a builder driven by conviction and empathy to grow Onchain Builders Economy in Africa. Over 15 years of working experience,  team leading and mentorship. Speaker at global events like ConsenSys Hyperlink , Zuzalu and Zuconnect, Ethsafari and Web3Lagos.
